cab.content: Thio !???.ury?nt is the Property offt prnFrom the Governor General of the Union ofSouth Africa to the Secretary of State for the Colons., (Received Colonial -Office 1.50 a.m. 16th August, 1919.)&'bh August.Your telegram 12th August Ratification of Peace Treaty Ministers regret that it was not found possible to convene Parliament before 5th September. They will adopt all necessary measures to expedite procedure for securing ratification of treaty at the earliest date but are at present doubtful --whether it to old be good policy to. submit resolution for the purpose instead of proceeding by way of a bill on * lines of the Imperial Act.BUTTON.
